comments.min_priority_score: Minimum priority score (0-100) to trigger email notification. Default: 60
comments.send_time: Time to send daily/weekly digest in HH:MM format (24-hour). Used by cron job.
comments.include_all_vehicles: If true, includes all matching vehicles. If false, only top max_vehicles_per_email
comments.max_vehicles_per_email: Maximum number of vehicles to include in email (top N by priority score)
comments.only_high_priority: If true, only send emails when high priority vehicles (score >= 80) are found
comments.exclude_reviewed: If true, exclude vehicles already reviewed by user from email
comments.send_empty_digest: If true, send digest even if no new vehicles found (not recommended)
